steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"6efvd","text":"Culture primary T cells using standard tissue culture techniques","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"107pq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"as0hv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"3FF39030E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E","id":680170,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Cell Culture"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"513mp","text":"Collect 200K to 1 million cells and sping them at 300g for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":59,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3F1D1B70E2AA11E8A970D5D4867F310E","duration":300,"label":"","step_guid":"57478C50E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E"}}],"guid":"57478C50E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E","id":680172,"previous_id":680170,"previous_guid":"3FF39030E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E","section":"Fixation and permeabilization"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"earc2","text":"Discard the supernatant, resuspend the cells in 1 mL PBS, spin them at 300g for   , and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":81,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"8fdmd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1uguf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3F1D1B70E2AA11E8A970D5D4867F310E","duration":300,"label":"","step_guid":"57478C50E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E"}}],"guid":"DE874430E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E","id":680174,"previous_id":680172,"previous_guid":"57478C50E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E","section":"Fixation and permeabilization"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9044s","text":"Fix the cells:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6a7da","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3a842","text":"If the cells are too clumpy and sticking to each other, first resuspend them in   PBS and mix them thouroughly until there are no clumps and add  of 16% formaldhyde on top.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":80,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":145,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8rb73","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2f8bf","text":"If there are no cell clumps, simply resuspend cells in   of Cytofix solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":55,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"59D4E690E2AB11E8BE508BDB3B832B60","amount":"750","unit":1,"label":"","step_guid":"FF8EECA0E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E"}},{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"5DB925A0E2AB11E8BE508BDB3B832B60","amount":"250","unit":1,"label":"","step_guid":"FF8EECA0E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E"}},{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"66425BB0E2AB11E8BE508BDB3B832B60","amount":"1","unit":2,"label":"","step_guid":"FF8EECA0E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E"}}],"guid":"FF8EECA0E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E","id":680175,"previous_id":680174,"previous_guid":"DE874430E2A811E8A970D5D4867F310E","section":"Fixation and permeabilization"}
